alert.note: Alert for Orange; Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:46AM EST until January 17 at 11:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Western Passaic County. In New York, Orange and Putnam Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy and difficult road conditions through the morning. Even though air temperatures should rise above freezing this morning, ground temperatures will be slow to rise above freezing until late morning. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
